p.s: Description of Haloferula sargassicola sp. nov.
Haloferula sargassicola (sar.gas′si.co′la. L. n. Sargassum a genus name of planktonic macroalgae; L. suff. -cola from L. n. incola inhabitant; N.L. n. sargassicola inhabitant of Sargassum).
Exhibits the following properties in addition to those given in the genus description.
Cells are 0.8–1.0 μm in width and 1.0–1.5 μm in length.
Neither cellular gliding movement nor swarming growth is observed.
Colonies grown on MA medium are circular, convex and pale-orange in colour.
NaCl is required for growth and can be tolerated up to 7 % (w/v).

Alkaline phosphatase, trypsin, acid phosphatase, naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase and α-mannosidase are positive, but esterase lipase (C8), leucine arylamidase, valine arylamidase, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase α-glucosidase, esterase (C4), lipase (C4), cystine arylamidase, chymotrypsin, β-glucuronidase, β-glucosidase and α-fucosidase are negative.

Dextrin, glycogen, N-acetyl-d-glucosamine, l-arabinose, cellobiose, d-fructose, d-galactose, gentiobiose, d-glucose, d-lactose, lactulose, maltose, d-mannose, melibiose, methyl β-d-glucoside, sucrose, trehalose, furanose, pyruvic acid methyl ester and thymidine are oxidized, but i-erythritol, d-psicose, raffinose, d-sorbitol, glycerol, glucose 6-phosphate, l-fucose, cis-aconitic acid, citric acid, succinic acid, cyclodextrin, Tween 40, Tween 80, N-acetyl-d-galactosamine, adonitol, d-arabitol, myo-inositol, d-mannitol, l-rhamnose, xylitol, succinic acid monomethyl ester, acetic acid, formic acid, d-galactonic acid lactone, d-galacturonic acid, d-gluconic acid, d-glucosaminic acid, d-glucuronic acid, α-hydroxybutyric acid, β-hydroxybutyric acid, γ-hydroxybutyric acid, p-hydroxyphenylacetic acid, itaconic acid, α-ketobutyric acid, α-ketoglutaric acid, α-ketovaleric acid, dl-lactic acid, malonic acid, propionic acid, quinic acid, d-saccharic acid, sebacic acid, bromosuccinic acid, succinamic acid, glucuronamide, alaninamide, d-alanine, l-alanine, l-alanyl glycine, l-asparagine, l-aspartic acid, l-glutamic acid, glycyl l-aspartic acid, glycyl l-glutamic acid, l-histidine, hydroxy-l-proline, l-leucine, l-ornithine, l-phenylalanine, l-proline, l-pyroglutamic acid, d-serine, l-serine, l-threonine, dl-carnitine, γ-aminobutyric acid, urocanic acid, inosine, uridine, phenylethylamine, putrescine, 2-aminoethanol, 2,3-butanediol, dl-α-glycerol phosphate and glucose 1-phosphate are not oxidized.
Cell wall peptidoglycan contains muramic acid and meso-diaminopimelic acid.
Major fatty acid components (>1.0 %) include C14 : 0, C15 : 0, C16 : 0, C18 : 0, C16 : 1ω7c, C16 : 1ω9c, iso-C14 : 0, iso-C16 : 0 and anteiso-C15 : 0.
The DNA G+C content is 64.7–64.8 mol%.
The type strain, MN1-1037T (=MBIC08343T=KCTC 22202T), and strain MN1-1047 were isolated from marine algae (Sargassum).
